content:
Prev: Cracking acorns Up: Observatory Campground Next: Mark and Sara play cards

Sorting acorn kernels



Terry boiled the better looking acorn kernels, replacing the water several times, in an unsuccessful attempt to make them palatable.
Unfortunately I didn't get any pictures despite Scott's request that I gather evidence for the forthcoming poisoning trial.
Taken Saturday, August 18, 2001, 09:49:53am.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 1.1Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/50s @ F6.3, ISO 100, 51mm
